title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers
synopsis: Mysterious cards came down from the sky one day. Capable of summoning powerful creatures from another dimension, they became the centerpiece of a new game called Bakugan. The game gained instant popularity among children and teenagers, with the best of them competing in a worldwide ranking.
related_anime: ['Bakugan Battle Brawlers: New Vestroia', 'Baku Tech! Bakugan', 'Bakugan: Battle Planet']
